text: The following lists events that happened during 2004 in the Democratic Republic of São Tomé and Príncipe. ==Incumbents== *President: Fradique de Menezes *Prime Minister: Maria das Neves (until 18 September), Damião Vaz d'Almeida (from 18 September) ==Events== *15 September: Maria das Neves was dismissed from the post as Prime MInister *18 September: Damião Vaz d'Almeida sworn in as Prime Minister succeeding Maria das Neves ==Sports== *GD Os Operários won the São Tomé and Príncipe Football Championship ==References== Category:Years of the 21st century in São Tomé and Príncipe Category:2000s in São Tomé and Príncipe São Tomé and Príncipe São Tomé and Príncipe
title: 2004 in São Tomé and Príncipe
